quote_first: Ramona Norville turned out to be a broad-shouldered, heavy-breasted, jovial woman of sixty or so with flushed cheeks, a Marine haircut, and a take-no-prisoners handshake. She was waiting for Tess outside the library, in the middle of the parking space reserved for Today’s Author of Note. Instead of wishing Tess a very good morning (it was
quote_last: ), or complimenting her on her earrings (diamond drops, an extravagance reserved for her few dinners out and engagements like this), she asked a man’s question: had Tess come by the 84?
title: Full Dark, No Stars
author: Stephen King

quote_first: If this is so, we have now to determine what Barker and Mrs. Douglas, presuming they are not the actual murderers, would have been doing from
quote_last: , when the sound of the shot brought them down, until quarter past eleven, when they rang for the bell and summoned the servants'.
title: The Valley of Fear
author: Arthur Conan Doyle

quote_first: They reached King’s Cross at a
quote_last: . Mr Weasley dashed across the road to get trolleys for their trunks and they all hurried into the station.
title: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
